src:
Kompak dengan Bursa Asia, IHSG Dibuka di Zona Hijau
04 Nov 2019, 02:10 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Ilustrasi/Foto: Rachman Haryanto

Jakarta - Indeks Harga Saham Gabungan (IHSG) dibuka positif pagi ini. IHSG terus naik 21 poin (0,36%) ke level 6.228.Nilai tukar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS) terhadap rupiah pagi ini melemah ke level Rp 13.995.Pada pra perdagangan, IHSG naik 11 poin (0,19%) ke 6.219. Indeks LQ45 naik 2,9 poin (0,30%) ke 983.Membuka perdagangan Senin (4/11/2019), IHSG terus naik 21 poin (0,36%) ke level 6.228. Indeks LQ45 naik 4,0 (0,52%) poin ke 985.Sementara itu, Pasar juga akan mencermati perkembangan negosiasi perang dagang China-AS. Larry Kudlow, penasehat ekonomi AS mengatakan telah terjadi kemajuan negosiasi damai perang dagang AS-China. AS ingin menandatangani kesepakatan di awal bulan November meskipun perjanjian fase I belum selesai dan beberapa masalah akan didorong ke fase kedua.Sebelumnya pejabat China pesimistis akan adanya kesepakatan dagang dalam jangka panjang. Ada laporan yang menulis China juga enggan untuk berkomitmen memenuhi tuntutan AS untuk membeli produk pertanian AS senilai US$ 50 miliar. Hal ini menjadi perhatian pasar karena akan menjadi sentimen ketidakpastian di pasar.The Fed pekan lalu melakukan pemotongan suku bunga acuannya sebesar 0,25% menjadi antara 1,50% dan 1,75%. Tetapi pernyataan The Fed bahwa pasar tenaga kerja tetap kuat, kegiatan ekonomi meningkat pada tingkat yang moderat, sementara investasi bisnis dan ekspor tetap lemah dan inflasi tetap di bawah target 2%.Bursa Asia pagi ini bergerak di zona hijau, berikut pergerakannya:

Indeks Nikkei 225 libur
Indeks Hang Seng bertambah 314 poin ke 27.415
Indeks Shanghai naik 18 poin ke 2.977
Indeks Strait Times menguat 9,6 poin ke 3.239


Simak Video "Dolar Tembus Rp 14.200 "

text:
Compact with Asian Exchanges, JCI Opened in the Green Zone
Nov 04 2019, 02:10 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Illustration / Photo: Rachman Haryanto

Jakarta - The Composite Stock Price Index (CSPI) opened positively this morning. JCI continued to rise 21 points (0.36%) to 6,228. The exchange rate of the United States dollar (US) against the rupiah this morning weakened to a level of Rp 13,995. In pre-trade, the CSPI rose 11 points (0.19%) to 6,219. The LQ45 index rose 2.9 points (0.30%) to 983. Opened trading Monday (11/04/2019), the JCI continued to rise 21 points (0.36%) to 6,228. The LQ45 index rose 4.0 (0.52%) points to 985. Meanwhile, the Market will also be watching the development of China-US trade war negotiations. Larry Kudlow, US economic adviser, said there had been progress in peace negotiations on the US-China trade war. The US wants to sign an agreement in early November even though the phase I agreement has not yet been completed and some problems will be pushed into the second phase. Previously Chinese officials were pessimistic about a long-term trade agreement. There are reports that China is also reluctant to commit to meeting US demands to buy US agricultural products worth US $ 50 billion. This is a concern of the market because it will be a sentiment of uncertainty in the market. The Fed last week cut its benchmark interest rate by 0.25% to between 1.50% and 1.75%. But the Fed's statement that the labor market remained strong, economic activity increased at a moderate rate, while business investment and exports remained weak and inflation remained below the target of 2%.

The Nikkei 225 index is off
The Hang Seng Index added 314 points to 27,415
The Shanghai index rose 18 points to 2,977
The Strait Times Index advanced 9.6 points to 3,239


Check out the video "Dollar Penetrates Rp. 14,200"
